tool_description: A minimal API that provides data on climate change news and related crisis from  around the world.
name: Live Climate News
title: Live Climate News

api_list.name: Get News Data from Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Get news about climate change and crisis from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Live Climate Change News Data
api_list.description: This endpoint will return  back all lives climate change news from all around the world.
